# Plan-G Entertainment

> Plan-G Entertainment ((주)플랜지엔터테인먼트) is a South Korean artist management company and IP studio connecting the world through music and content.

## Company Overview

- **Official Name**: (주)플랜지엔터테인먼트 (Plan-G Entertainment Co., Ltd.)
- **Website**: https://plan-g.io/
- **Business**: Artist Management & IP Studio
- **Contact**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Phone**: 010-3369-2598

## Artists

### Gaho (가호)
- **Role**: Singer-Songwriter
- **Instagram**: https://www.instagram.com/ad_gaho
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/gaho_official
- **Spotify**: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3ybZTNrlK0QhL4rBxfLHOc
- **X (Twitter)**: https://x.com/gaho88882970
- **TikTok**: https://www.tiktok.com/@ad_gaho

## About

Plan-G (플랜지) is a music label dedicated to discovering authentic artists and maximizing their potential. We believe in the power of original artistry and innovative sound. We build deep connections between artists and fans, preserve the true essence of music, and open new possibilities.

From music production to global distribution, Plan-G stands alongside artists throughout their creative journey, becoming a steadfast partner to help their voices reach the world.

## Contact Information

- **Business Inquiries**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Press & Media**: contact@plan-g.io
- **Artist Management**: 010-3369-2598

## Social Media

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ad_gaho
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/gaho_official

## Languages

This website is available in Korean (ko), English (en), and Spanish (es).
